product_name: Scott Road Pro Lady Bike Shoes - Women's
long_description: The Scott Road Pro Lady Bike Shoes feature a women-specific instep and a very stiff, lightweight sole, creating the perfect combination of comfort, fit and power. Sole is rated 7 on the stiffness index, guaranteeing smooth, efficient power transfer while allowing enough flex to reduce strain on both feet and joints. Synthetic-leather uppers wrap the foot like a second skin and are free of pressure points. Closure system of 2 straps and 1 buckle fine-tunes the fit. RAM air system pulls air in through vents under the toes to keep feet cool for better performance. Scott Road Pro Lady Bike Shoes are engineered to support active, performance-driven athletes.
short_description: The Scott Road Pro Lady Bike Shoes feature a women-specific instep and a very stiff, lightweight sole, creating the perfect combination of comfort, fit and power.
